meanings.definition: A type of embroidery technique used to gather fabric in a decorative manner.
meanings.sent1: The dress had beautiful smocking along the waistline.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to do smocking on a sewing project.
meanings.sent3: The smocking on the pillow made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like skilled dancers as she did the smocking.
meanings.sent5: The intricate smocking on the dress resembled delicate waves.

meanings.definition: The act of creating decorative gathers in fabric using the smocking technique.
meanings.sent1: Her smocking on the dress added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The smocking on the curtains gave them a unique texture.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the smocking on the tablecloth.
meanings.sent4: The smocking transformed the plain fabric into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The smocking technique requires patience and precision.
